description:
An excellent all-around PFD for young (or just light) adults. The fabric is designed to resist stains, and the segmented foam flexes easily as you move.

  • Ultra-soft, stain resistant fabric
  • Segmented foam provides great fit and freedom of movement
  • MOLLE inspired accessory attachment
  • Ventilated mesh back and wicking liner for coolness
  • For users weighing 40-50kg (88-110lbs)
  • Fits chest circumference between 71-81cm
  • Meets Harmonized Level 70 buoyancy standard. Approved by Transport Canada and US Coast Guard
name: Mustang Survival Rev Young Adult Foam Vest - Unisex
